fullDescription.intro:
The node allows user to populate Neo4j with the data.
Script - active when there is no input table connected. User can create a Cypher script with injections of labels for nodes and relationships, and available server functions to populate the database.
Schema is fetched with functions db.labels, db.relationshipTypes, dbms.functions.
Query from table - if the table is connected, then user can select the string column that contains Cypher queries. Output will always be a JSON column.

tab.name: Script
tab.option: if active the node will return an error and stop execution in case the query was not successfully executed. Otherwise node will produce an empty table and a warning message.
the text box, where use can put Cypher query with nodes, relationship, function and flow variables injections.

tab.name: Query from table
tab.option: queries from the selected string column will be executed. Results and status will be returned as a JSON column.

if active the node will return an error and stop execution in case the query was not successfully executed. Otherwise node will produce an empty table and a warning message. All the transactions will be rolled back.
if active all the queries will be running in asynchronous mode, otherwise there will be consequent execution starting from the top of the table.
